title: Data Engineer (m/f/d)

company.name: Eufomex
company.about: Eufomex is a consulting firm providing high-quality Data Management services to top-tier financial institutions across Germany and the DACH region. The firm values professional development and work-life balance, offering support for international candidates relocating to Germany.

tasks: Work with large volumes of data to derive insights
Design and implement suitable data structures for complex service data
Develop Data Warehouse solutions and maintain data integrity and quality
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and set project objectives

experience.etl_di: 5+ years of relevant experience in ETL/DI
experience.database_technologies: 5+ years of experience with various database technologies
experience.financial_sector: 5+ years of experience in the financial sector
experience.sql: Advanced SQL skills for complex query writing and optimization

skills_required.education: University degree in Computer Science, Finance, Mathematics, Physics, or a related quantitative field
skills_required.communication: Excellent English verbal and written communication skills

skills_desired.shell_scripting: Proficiency in shell scripting within Linux/UNIX environments
